A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Had the ingredients to be one of the best. But somehow the director managed to screw up everything other than the quality of the visual effects and sound. After seeing this film I felt as though a close friend had died in a violent and unexpected way. The damage cannot be undone. How this terrible movie reaches back in time and manages to vomit all over the original trilogy is actually an amazing achievement. Completely heartbreaking.
